__e: YOU'RE NOT LIKE MAKING IT, LIKE, YOU KNOW, LIKE, "YO, WHAT UP?" YOU'RE NOT-- YOU DON'T BE DOING NONE OF THAT SHIT - WHEN I'M NOT AROUND, RIGHT?
Well, I need a family, but I made a whole lot of poor life choices.
I know you two love each other, but your mom made some bad decisions, too, and I can't help her unless you help me.
What your father did to you, the choices I had to make...
I know that's not very flattering to you, but I've been thinking about us. And about the choices I've made.
I see the things that you do and the ways that you hurt yourself, and I know it's because of the choices I've made.
I don't know what it looks like, or who's there... but I do believe there are consequences for the way we live our lives.
We are the choices we make in the moment, as you said.
We have to live with the choices we make. But sometimes we have to die with them, too.
And you ended up making choices that you never would have, were you in your right mind.
I see the things that you do and the ways that you hurt yourself, and I know it's because of the choices I've made.
But even though I share their blood and their history it's the choices that I make today and every day that make me who I am.
You have made your choices, and there's no coming back from them.
You made his choices... And you did yours.
It sounds great. You know, you have a lot of time, but then you just think and you replay your choices and you wonder if you did the right thing.
Look, I am fine with anyone's life choice.
You know, I don't know if you were trying to make me feel bad about my life choices.
The same way my boyfriend makes me feel terrible about my life choices.
Well, your brother's choices aren't your fault.
The same way my boyfriend makes me feel terrible about my life choices.
But you have to let me make my own choices, live my own life, not the life you want for me.
Pop always made the hard choices for the greater good.
I'm sorry that I lied to you and your brother, But I've had to make hard choices for the greater good.
You need me to make the hard choices for you, because I see what's inside you.
So my advice to you is to get it right this time around, because this time... is all you have.
Which makes me feel like you're not in a position to make right choices for yourself.
But how can you make any good choices...
